channel.title: Reference on IPFS Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on IPFS Documentation

item.title: Working with Go IPFS
item.description: go-ipfs is the primary reference implementation of IPFS. It is a command-line application, but can also be used as a library in other Go programs. For more about using the ipfs application, see basic usage or any of the following reference documents: Configuration reference Datastore configuration Experimental features Installing command completion Mounting IPFS with FUSE Installing plugins For more technical information about building, debugging or using the API, see:
